message.raw:
Pleiades now working.  Serious hack to distutils to get h5py working (edit to unixccompiler).  But we run!

Dedalus now working on Pleiades.  First tests occuring now, but we've successfully started up on anelastic convection and built pencils, done first timesteps, etc.  Still need to check that h5py outputs are actually working, etc.
